order by sum(a.ormtqt) desc,b.sampno

select x.*,0 qymtqt,0 qymtam from ( select c.spclno,d.itnm as spclnm, round(sum(decode(a.suitno,'T01',0.75,'T02',0.25,'T04',0.25,1)*a.ormtqt)) as ormtqt
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.spftpr) ormtam
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.sprtpr) ormtam
from ord_ord e,ord_orddtl a,ord_sample_design b,ord_sample_plan c,ord_pub_code d,ORD_SAMPLE_DESIGN_STPR f where a.sampno=b.sampno and b.plspno=c.plspno and c.spclno=d.itno and d.tyno=0 and a.sampno=f.sampno and a.suitno=f.suitno and e.mtorno=a.mtorno and e.ortyno='DZ' and a.ormtqt!=0 and e.ormtno=#{ormtno} and e.ordorg=#{ordorg} and c.bradno=#{bradno} group by c.spclno,d.itnm ) x order by x.spclno

select x.*,0 qymtqt,0 qymtam from ( select c.sptyno spclno,d.itnm as spclnm, round(sum(decode(a.suitno,'T01',0.75,'T02',0.25,'T04',0.25,1)*a.ormtqt)) as ormtqt
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.spftpr) ormtam
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.sprtpr) ormtam
from ord_ord e,ord_orddtl a,ord_sample_design b,ord_sample_plan c,ord_pub_code d,ORD_SAMPLE_DESIGN_STPR f where a.sampno=b.sampno and b.plspno=c.plspno and c.sptyno=d.itno and d.tyno='2' and a.sampno=f.sampno and a.suitno=f.suitno and e.mtorno=a.mtorno and e.ortyno='DZ' and a.ormtqt!=0 and e.ormtno=#{ormtno} and e.ordorg=#{ordorg} and c.bradno=#{bradno} and c.spclno=#{spclno} group by c.sptyno,d.itnm ) x order by x.spclno

select x.*,0 qymtqt,0 qymtam from ( select c.spseno spclno,d.itnm as spclnm, round(sum(decode(a.suitno,'T01',0.75,'T02',0.25,'T04',0.25,1)*a.ormtqt)) as ormtqt
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.spftpr) ormtam
,sum(a.ormtqt*f.sprtpr) ormtam
from ord_ord e,ord_orddtl a,ord_sample_design b,ord_sample_plan c,ord_pub_code d,ORD_SAMPLE_DESIGN_STPR f where a.sampno=b.sampno and b.plspno=c.plspno and c.spseno=d.itno and d.tyno='5' and a.sampno=f.sampno and a.suitno=f.suitno and e.mtorno=a.mtorno and e.ortyno='DZ' and a.ormtqt!=0 and e.ormtno=#{ormtno} and e.ordorg=#{ordorg} and c.bradno=#{bradno} and c.spclno=#{spclno} group by c.spseno,d.itnm ) x order by x.spclno

select x.clppnm,x.dapei_imgnm ,x.sampnm1 sampnm,x.imgnm ,sum(Z.ORMTQT) num ,sum(Z.ORMTQT) num_dh from ( select a.clppnm,b.clspno,b.sampno,d.sampnm1,nvl(c.imgnm,'./images/no_photo.jpg') dapei_imgnm,nvl(e.imgnm,'./images/no_photo.jpg') imgnm from ORD_SAMPLE_CLHD a inner join ORD_SAMPLE_CLDTL b on a.clppno=b.clppno inner join ORD_SAMPLE_design d on b.sampno=d.sampno inner join ORD_SAMPLE_PLAN F on D.PLSPNO=F.PLSPNO left join ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT c on a.clppno=c.clppno left join (select a.* from Ord_Sample_Photo a where not exists(select 1 from Ord_Sample_Photo b where a.sampno=b.sampno and a.id>b.id)) e on b.sampno=e.sampno where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.clppst=1 AND F.SPCLNO NOT IN('06','07') order by a.CLPPNO,b.clspno ) x left join ( select b.SAMPNO,b.ORMTQT from ORD_ORD a inner join ORD_ORDDTL b on a.MTORNO=b.MTORNO where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.ordorg=#{ordorg} and b.suitno in ('T00','T01') ) y on x.sampno=y.sampno left join ( select b.SAMPNO,b.ORMTQT from ORD_ORD a inner join ORD_ORDDTL b on a.MTORNO=b.MTORNO inner join ORD_SAMPLE_design C on b.sampno=C.sampno inner join ORD_SAMPLE_PLAN d on C.PLSPNO=d.PLSPNO where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.ordorg=#{ordorg} and b.suitno in ('T00','T01') AND D.SPCLNO NOT IN('06','07') ) Z on x.sampno=Z.sampno group by x.clppnm,x.dapei_imgnm ,x.sampnm1 ,x.imgnm order by x.clppnm,x.sampnm1
select A.ORGNO AS QYNO,A.ORGNM AS QYNM from t_org a,t_org_org b where a.orgno=b.child_no and b.parent_no=#{yxgsno} and dim='SALE' AND A.ORGST='KQ'

select x.clppnm,x.dapei_imgnm ,x.sampnm1 sampnm,x.imgnm ,sum(y.ORMTQT) num_dh from ( select a.clppnm,b.clspno,b.sampno,d.sampnm1,nvl(c.imgnm,'./images/no_photo.jpg') dapei_imgnm,nvl(e.imgnm,'./images/no_photo.jpg') imgnm from ORD_SAMPLE_CLHD a inner join ORD_SAMPLE_CLDTL b on a.clppno=b.clppno inner join ORD_SAMPLE_design d on b.sampno=d.sampno left join ORD_SAMPLE_CLPHT c on a.clppno=c.clppno left join (select a.* from Ord_Sample_Photo a where not exists(select 1 from Ord_Sample_Photo b where a.sampno=b.sampno and a.id>b.id)) e on b.sampno=e.sampno where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.clppst=1 and a.clppnm=#{clppnm} order by a.CLPPNO,b.clspno ) x left join ( select b.SAMPNO,b.ORMTQT from ORD_ORD a inner join ORD_ORDDTL b on a.MTORNO=b.MTORNO where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and a.ordorg=#{ordorg} and b.suitno in ('T00','T01') ) y on x.sampno=y.sampno
group by x.clppnm,x.dapei_imgnm ,x.sampnm1 ,x.imgnm order by x.clppnm,x.sampnm1
